story_alola_01_06000/2401_1101_0100_20: Ultra Beasts continued appearing all over Pasio.
story_alola_01_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: You were born to be a beast killer...
story_alola_01_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But I’m sure you can use that power to protect
the Ultra Beasts instead!
story_alola_01_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: I wonder if Elio and the others are okay...
story_alola_01_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Don’t worry about them. I asked them to help for
a reason.
story_alola_01_06000/2401_1001_1000_10: We have to make it through this first.
